hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: I went to Mount Tur and met Humayl ibn Basrah al-Ghifari, a companion of the Prophet ﷺ. He said: I heard the Prophet ﷺ saying: "The riding animals are not ridden to except to three masjids: the Sacred Masjid (Masjid al-Haram), my masjid (in Madinah), and the Masjid of Ilia (in Bait al-Maqdis)." And Musa ibn Ismail said: Narrated to us Abu Awanah who said: Narrated to us Abd al-Malik ibn Umayr from Umar ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn al-Harith who said: Abu Basrah al-Ghifari met Abu Hurayrah coming from Mount Tur. (I said: From where did you come?) It is similar to the above hadith.

narrators.name: Zaid
